item.title: How to get startup ideas?
item.description:
How to get startup ideas?

The way to get startup ideas is not to try to think of startup ideas. It's to look for problems, preferably problems you have yourself. The very best startup ideas tend to have three things in common: they're something the founders themselves want, that they themselves can build, and that few others realize are worth doing. Microsoft, Apple, Yahoo, Google, and Facebook all began this way.

item.title: Maform
item.description:
Maform

Shark Airship Shuttle is an aircraft concept, which is the mixture of a traditional airship and an airplane. It is capable of hovering as an airship and also capable of gliding by decreasing the buoyancy.

item.title: Customer needs are always changing. How do brands stay relevant?

Method creates solutions for our clients that help them build relevance today and into the future.

item.title: Internet Of Things Will Deliver $1.9 Trillion Boost To Supply Chain And Logistics Operations
item.description:
Internet Of Things Will Deliver $1.9 Trillion Boost To Supply Chain And Logistics Operations

DHL and Cisco Internet of Things Trend Report reveals huge potential for more efficient and transparent supply chains An estimated US$ 8 trillion to be generated through new connections over next decade Dubai/Bonn, 15 April 2015: DHL, the world's leading logistics service provider, and Cisco, the worldwide leader in IT, have jointly released a new Trend Report focused on the Internet of Things (IoT) at the DHL Global Technology Conference in Dubai today.

item.title: Salesforce
item.description:
Salesforce

Creating a live broadcasting experience for the 2014 Dreamforce Conference Method partnered with Salesforce to design and develop a multi-channel online broadcast experience to complement the 2014 Dreamforce conference in San Francisco. The conference brings together industry visionaries, product experts, and world leaders for four days of innovation, celebration, and collaboration.
